summary.span: Representa la clase usada por la infraestructura de WCF Data Services para establecer una conexi√≥n a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

span.span: Represents the class used by the infrastructure of WCF Data Services to connect to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase permite a [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] enlazar a WCF como un controlador HTTP sin formato.This class enables [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to hook up to WCF as a raw HTTP handler. No se recomienda su uso por parte de terceros.Not recommended for use by third parties.
